verses.verse: <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G4053>advantage<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> hath the <S%G2453>Jew<s%>? <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5622>profit<s%> is there of <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>?

<S%G4183>Much<s%> <S%G2596%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5158>way<s%>: <S%G4412>chiefly<s%>, <S%G3303%G1063>because<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> unto them were <S%G4100>committed<s%> the <S%G3051>oracles<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> did not <S%G569%G3361>believe<s%>? <S%G2673>shall<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G570>unbelief<s%> <S%G2673>make<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> without <S%G2673>effect<s%>?

God <S%G3361%G1096>forbid<s%>: <S%G1161>yea<s%>, <S%G1096>let<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> a <S%G5583>liar<s%>; <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G3704>That<s%> thou <S%G302>mightest<s%> be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> mightest <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G4571>thou<s%> art <S%G2919>judged<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G4921>commend<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G2046%G3361>say<s%>? Is <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> who <S%G2018>taketh<s%> <S%G3709>vengeance<s%>? (I <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>)
God <S%G3361%G1096>forbid<s%>: for <S%G1893>then<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G2919>shall<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> hath more <S%G4052>abounded<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5582>lie<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>; <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2919>am<s%> I <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G268>sinner<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> rather, <S%G2531>(as<s%> we be slanderously <S%G987>reported<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5346>affirm<s%> that <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G3004%G3754>say<s%>,) Let us <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> may <S%G2064>come<s%>? <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2917>damnation<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1738>just<s%>.

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? are we <S%G4284>better<s%> than they? <S%G3756>No<s%>, in no <S%G3843>wise<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> we have before <S%G4256>proved<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1672>Gentiles<s%>, that they <S%G1511>are<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>;
<S%G2531>As<s%> it is <S%G1125%G3754>written<s%>, There <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%>, no, <S%G3761>not<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>:
There <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>none<s%> that <S%G4920>understandeth<s%>, there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>none<s%> that seeketh <S%G1567>after<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

They <S%G1578>are<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> gone out of the <S%G1578>way<s%>, they <S%G889>are<s%> <S%G260>together<s%> become <S%G889>unprofitable<s%>; there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>none<s%> that <S%G4160>doeth<s%> <S%G5544>good<s%>, no, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2076%G2193%G1520>one<s%>.

<S%G846>Their<s%> <S%G2995>throat<s%> is an <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G5028>sepulchre<s%>; with <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1100>tongues<s%> they have used <S%G1387>deceit<s%>; the <S%G2447>poison<s%> of <S%G785>asps<s%> is <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5491>lips<s%>:
<S%G3739>Whose<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> is <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G685>cursing<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4088>bitterness<s%>:
<S%G846>Their<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> are <S%G3691>swift<s%> to <S%G1632>shed<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>:
<S%G4938>Destruction<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5004>misery<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%>:
<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G1097>have<s%> they <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%>:
There <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G561>before<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> what things <S%G3745>soever<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, it <S%G2980>saith<s%> to them who are <S%G1722>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>: <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> may be <S%G5420>stopped<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5267>guilty<s%> before <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1360>Therefore<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> there <S%G1344>shall<s%> <S%G3956%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> be <S%G1344>justified<s%> in <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1799>sight<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> is the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G5319>manifested<s%>, being <S%G3140>witnessed<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>;

<S%G1161>Even<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G4100>believe<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1293>difference<s%>:
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> come <S%G5302>short<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;
Being <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1432>freely<s%> by <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G629>redemption<s%> that is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>:

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath set <S%G4388>forth<s%> to be a <S%G2435>propitiation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1732>declare<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3929>remission<s%> of <S%G265>sins<s%> that are <S%G4266>past<s%>, <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G463>forbearance<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>;

<S%G4314>To<s%> <S%G1732>declare<s%>, I say, <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3568>this<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>: <S%G1519>that<s%> he might <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G1342>just<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1344>justifier<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> which <S%G4102>believeth<s%> <S%G1537>in<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G4226>Where<s%> is <S%G2746>boasting<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? It is <S%G1576>excluded<s%>. <S%G1223>By<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>? of <S%G2041>works<s%>? <S%G3780>Nay<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>.
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> we <S%G3049>conclude<s%> that a <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

Is <S%G2228>he<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>? is he <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G1161%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>? <S%G3483>Yes<s%>, of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>:

<S%G1897>Seeing<s%> it is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G1344>justify<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

Do <S%G2673>we<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> make <S%G2673>void<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>? God <S%G3361%G1096>forbid<s%>: <S%G235>yea<s%>, we <S%G2476>establish<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>.
